label: appliedAgriculturalApplication
comment: Any substance such as seed, fertilizer, water, gas or chemical applied to an agricultural field, substrate, construction, plant, animal or product.

rangeIncludes.comment: Any substance such as seed, fertilizer, water, gas or chemical applied to an agricultural field, substrate, construction, plant, animal or product.

domainIncludes.comment: A group of products considered or dealt with together.
A practice of cultivating land, raising crops, or treatment of the agricultural produce.
A named, delimited and identified part of a land and or water surface of the globe subject to dedicated uniform agricultural treatment.
A field with one or more cultivated plants or produce from one or more botanical species or varieties.
A small piece of land or water used for a crop such as an agricultural or aquacultural crop.
